name: Ruin of memories
description:
Description over Ruin of memories Ruin of memories is a simulation and quest based game.   Story: The owl Luna is the voice of her people, who have already fallen in a battle with the people where Lynx  also lives. Luna and her people are still searching for peace in the ruins. It is said that she took the memories of her own people. So that her people would not have to deal with them after her death. But to take care of the preservation of the ruins and nature. Lynx was also there at that time to look at the ruins after the battle, because Lynx was not yet born at that time where the battle took place. Because of this fate, she lost half of her memory. When Luna took her memory by fate. Lynx returned to get her memories back from Luna. Otherwise, it is also not granted by her people that she may not return in the future. Whether she gets her memory back now depends on whether she completes all of Luna's missions. Scrolls show you the way.  Collect all collectibles like Keys to continue with the story. You have to find Souls and Ammonites in the labyrinths.

               

souls                                    ammonite (fossils) Little helpers will support you. To open doors for you. Controls: Gamepad:                                                        Keyboard:

 

Ruin of memories is a project that took place in the 2nd semester of the HTK Academy.
